name: Fading Remnants
description:
This is an IGMC 2018 submission, and due to being a game jam/contest entry this project is unfinished.  

The earth has changed these past few years. Humanity is a lonely shell of what it once was, and the world is a very different place. In the face of such hardship, how does one cope with loss, and how far would you go for family? 

In a small country town overcome by nature, Lia and her friends are on the trail of someone they hold very dear. Journey with them as they meet strange new people, solve puzzles, and search for answers in a world that has forgotten mankind.  If Lia can push through the haunting memories of her past, perhaps she'll discover a path toward something that feels closer to home. 

  • Futrchamp - Music, Sound Design, Story
  • Hiddenone - Eventing, Puzzle Mechanics, Story
  • Gabrelik - Writing, Artwork, Story
  • Plueschkatze - Sprites, Artwork, Eventing, Story

Plugins: Chaucer, Galv, Moghunter, Hudell, mjshi and Yanfly

Testers: FrozenNorseman, Chiara, Finnuval, Bryan Carpmail, Charles "Rawdog" Heeneman, Abe Benson, Thao the Wise, Adam Schmidt, D.E. Simon and Paladin-Cleric of Awesome
